sub_title: Marketing Leader | Healthcare Informatics | AI | SaaS| Cloud| Story Wizard| Certified SCRUM Master | Digital Evangelist
summary:
I’m a passionate and experienced marketing leader working in a diverse international business environment with a digital-savvy approach and 8+ years of work experience.

My professional experience:
Besides working with Fortune 500 companies (Philips, Booking.com, Elsevier, Vodafone, Cognizant & Cummins) I also had the opportunity to work with entrepreneurial business ventures like SuperSaaS, Advaiya & HungryTable.in. Having worked in 3 countries and more than 6 different cities, I have an international mindset that allows me to build long-lasting relationships with people from different cultures. I work well with cross-functional teams & thrive in uncertain fast-paced business environments. I am a self-starter who embraces agile and experimental styles of working.

Educational background:
I have an educational background in marketing, communication, and business with a mix of technical expertise. Armed with diverse education, I’m able to think in a creative yet structured manner, understanding the business side as well as the technical side behind every project. I also continue to educate myself in my free time to feed my curiosity.

Languages: I speak 5 languages including English, Hindi & Dutch

Key competencies: Marketing Communication, Product Management, Project Management, Social Media Marketing, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Search Engine Advertising (SEA), Data Analytics, Business Development, Market Research, Inbound & Outbound Marketing

Tools I have worked with: Salesforce Pardot, HubSpot, Adobe Analytics, Tableau, KNIME, Adobe Photoshop, Google Analytics, Google Search Console, Google AdWords, Adobe XD, HTML/CSS, Google Tag Manager, My SQL, Java, .NET, WordPress, MailChimp, Oracle Marketing Cloud Eloqua, Marketo, Adobe Illustrator

Professionally & personally I am: curious, eager to learn, customer-oriented, creative, social, strategic, hardworking, flexible, fast adapter, optimistic & hands-on.

When I’m not spending time learning a new tool, I’m relishing exquisite delicacies or traveling around the world and writing about my experiences on my blog Mr & Mrs. Sachdeva.

projects.title: Product Strategy and Management- Ramping Up Tanishq Sales in Indian Jewelry Market
projects.description: The purpose of the project was to apply the product strategy and management frameworks to study the marketing strategy of Tanishq in India. We fist analyzed the customer behavior to understand the customer needs. We then focused on finding out the characteristics of different segments that Tanishq serves and the strategy adopted by Tanishq for each segment to get the broad brand perception of Tanishq among its customers. We analyzed the macroeconomic factors impacting Tanishq's performance and provided recommendations to improve existing performance and increase sale in identified areas.

projects.title: Analyzing the Social Media Marketing effectiveness of PepsiCo India Facebook Page
projects.description:
The purpose of the project was to analyze the posts on the facebook page of the company under each tab. The posts were analyzed based on the frequency of posting and then categorized based on the number of posts done by the company and those done by the followers of the company. The number of comments on each post were then categorized based on the emotions i.e. appreciative posts, neutral, criticizing, etc. The remaining page statistics were analyzed in detail using Fanpage Karma to find out what interests the consumers and the topics most spoken about.

The posts were then analyzed to find out which kind of content generated maximum amount of replies (not likes, written replies) and counter replies to better understand the consumer sentiment. The report then summarized the findings to conclude which kind of posts generated maximum conversations and positive responses from the followers.

projects.title: Heartbeat Rate Monitoring System using PIC Microcontroller
projects.description: The project was based on a bio-medical application of PIC micro-controller. The hardware consisted of a heart beat detecting sensor, signal conditioner circuit, PIC micro-controller, buzzer, LCD and 4x4 matrix keypad. The aim of the project was to display the heart rate of a person and check whether it lies in the ideal range of heartbeat corresponding to his/her age group.

profile_positions.title: Marketing Leader Sales Enablement, Loyalty & Comms (Europe & Growth), Enterprise Informatics

profile_positions.description:
Philips Connected Care Informatics solutions provide deep insights at the points-of-care in acute, ambulatory, and interventional settings, and beyond to simplify care orchestration for providers and help improve patient outcomes and experience. In this role, I am responsible for:
- Business Strategy: Responsible for developing engagement strategy, plans and content approach for Philips Connected Care Informatics portfolio
- Stakeholder Management: Act as advisor to informatics cluster, business and market marketing stakeholders (including portfolio marketing, product management, business development). Provide content leadership across health system for health suite enabler themes like Artificial Intelligence, cloud, SaaS, interoperability, cyber security & analytics
- Content Development: Partner with portfolio marketing managers, product managers, health systems engagement teams, group press office, asset creation and digital marketing to realize and activate integrated campaigns and develop winning content. In cooperation with other functions (asset creation, etc), provide value and efficiencies for markets through centrally-developed messaging, content and campaign assets for suites of solutions, hero new product introductions and sustaining programs in line with business and cluster priorities.
- Agency management: Support selection of the required agencies and suppliers, provide optimal briefing and clear guidance.
- Regional Cooperation: Support markets as needed as they manage global advertising and media agency networks for campaign activation. Guard the brand, in close corporation with marketing, asset creation and agencies
- Data Analytics & Measurement: Understand and act on the main drivers for content and campaign effectiveness and ROI. Contribute to measuring and reporting on overall Marketing ROI effort.
- Continuous improvement & optimization: Drive and share learnings across Connected Care Informatics cluster and replicate best practices globally.
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager, Informatics, Content & Engagement Strategy, Connected Care

profile_positions.description:
Portfolio: Responsible for managing the marketing activities of a portfolio of over $83M annually covering a span of 120+ premium subscription journals including titles from The Cell Press, The Lancet, and society titles including JACC, JTCVS, JTO, AWHONN among many others.

My key responsibilities include the following:
•	Business Strategy: Development & execution of the JLS business strategy driving new sales worth $6.2M (FY 2021) across sub-groups The Lancet, Cell Press, and societies. Streamlined the business planning creating a direct correlation between business activities & revenue
•	Lead Generation: Optimized the Recommend to Librarian researcher lead generation program to drive 26k+ leads in 2021 (5x growth from 2020) generating a direct revenue impact of $500k & creating a real-time sales-focused lead qualification process
•	Customer Engagement: Strengthened the JLS researcher engagement program by building BrightTalk webinars channel from 3k followers (2019) to 43k+ followers (2021), creating email follow-ups to drive MQLs and optimizing librarian engagement email campaigns via Salesforce Pardot
•	Sales Enablement: Designed global & regional marketing collateral for sales, supported optimization of automated email engagement via sales tool Outreach, increased engagement via monthly newsletters from 30% to 42%, and supported the team to deliver ambitious sales goals ($83.2M revenue) & deliver a 102% target vs achievement
•	Stakeholder Management: Partnered with cross-functional teams to support JLS growth across different customer segments

An active committee member for the Your Elsevier Employee Resource Group (ERG) which supports newly onboarding members at Elsevier, promotes networking events and cross-cultural events at the organization.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager JLS (STMJ)

profile_positions.description:
SuperSaaS is a flexible online appointment scheduling system for individuals & businesses. SuperSaaS is available in more than 30 languages and attracts customers from 170+ countries with more than 120,000 customers.

Responsibilities & Achievements:
→ Marketing Strategy: Develop & execute the global marketing strategy & manage the marketing budget. Delivered a 5.2% yoy revenue growth in FY 2018

→ Campaign Management: Identifying target customers, creating buyer personas & developing campaign strategies with a focus on improving user acquisition. Optimized campaigns resulted in a 52% growth in new users, 30% growth in organic traffic & SEO improvement by 120% (2018)

→ SEO, SEA & SMM: Improve customer experience & web presence by a combination of search engine optimization (SEO), social media marketing (SMM), cross-selling partnerships, influencer marketing & via paid advertising (SEA). 

Reduced CPA from $14 to $9 in paid advertising, created monthly marketing reports with Google Analytics & ensured brand consistency across all platforms.

→ Content Marketing: Creating marketing collateral including case studies, landing pages, blog posts, etc. & working with data analytics tools like SQL & Tableau to deliver data-driven insights into consumer behavior

→ Email Marketing: Revamped the customer lifecycle email marketing strategy to increase the conversion rate from leads to subscribers

→ Stakeholder Management: Work with channel partners across the globe & align the marketing strategy to drive sales in each market with ~17% growth in 2018-19

→ Customer Engagement: Improved customer engagement by 30% by revamping & designing new website content. Strong experience in A/B testing & responsible for monitoring competitive & market insights.

→ Customer Service: Managed a team of 12 customer service representatives across the globe. SuperSaaS won the best customer service award by G2 & Capterra with a 65% growth in the number of positive reviews.
profile_positions.title: Product Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
→ Marketing Strategy: Created a strategic marketing plan & handle product positioning for a portfolio of 3.5 Million customers delivering 12% yoy revenue growth

→ Content Marketing: Designed content for different stages of buyer journey including white-papers, presentations, e-books, etc., maintained the marketing calendar, created buyer personas & conducted ATL/BTL campaigns

→ Pricing & Positioning: Managed product pricing, positioning & search engine optimization (SEO) & designed go-to-market strategies to support product growth. Launched 30+ new products

→ Branding & Agency Management: Worked with external agencies like Ogilvy & Mather to create brand-related content including emails, social media posts, etc.

→ Product Development: Launched an innovative 6 in 1 paper recharge product driving the sales by 2 Mn INR in 2 months & increasing the paper coupon penetration by 13.4%. Received the top-performer award in Q3 2017

→ Campaign Management: Managed social media marketing, search engine advertising, WhatsApp marketing, SMS & email marketing to target enterprise customers

→ Cross-functional team management: Oversaw a team of 15 area sales managers, ensured cross-functional team alignment with business goals and drove key KPIs via sales & retail channels

→ Consumer Insight: Used analytics tools like MySQL & Tableau to deliver insights into consumer behavior & kept a close watch on market intelligence to drive sharp insights on delivery gaps
profile_positions.title: Product Manager (Data)

→ Conducted product training sessions for a team of 20+ National account managers & received the top-bucket rating for exceptional work 

III) Consumer Marketing: Data Product Manager
→ Provided key consumer insights & created new segmentation with strategy having 15cr rev. potential
→ Design & implementation of special sales incentive plan for 30-member outbound calling team
→ Formulation & execution of customer retention strategy
→ Re-captured 1.1 lac customers on targeted 5.4lac customers through execution of 10+ marketing campaigns
